definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: Secondhand smoke causes at least half the cases of lung cancer in non-smokers.
sentences.chinese: 二手烟会导致至少二分之一的不吸烟者致癌。

sentences.english: They are pleased that they needn't inhale second hand smoke any more.
sentences.chinese: 他们很高兴再也不会吸到二手烟了。

sentences.english: There is no risk-free level of exposure to secondhand smoke.
sentences.chinese: 没有风险的二手烟含量是不存在的。

sentences.english: The dangerous particles in secondhand smoke can linger in the air for hours.
sentences.chinese: 二手烟里的有害成分可以在空气中存在几个小时。

sentences.english: Children were most likely to breathe secondhand smoke in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们最有可能在自己家中吸到二手烟。

sentences.english: Yeah, it's harmful to passive smokers too and it will pollute the air.
sentences.chinese: 知道，而且对吸二手烟者也有害，还污染空气。

sentences.english: 000 nonsmokers die every year from secondhand smoke.
sentences.chinese: 每年有5万3千名非吸烟者死于二手烟。

sentences.english: How can secondhand smoke be avoided?
sentences.chinese: 该如何避免吸入二手烟？

sentences.english: Reduce exposure to things that could trigger an asthma attack such as allergens and secondhand smoke.
sentences.chinese: 降低对哮喘诱发因素的暴露，例如变应原和二手烟。

sentences.english: Regular exposure to second-hand smoke heightens the chance of a stroke by 50 per cent.
sentences.chinese: 经常接触二手烟会增加50%患中风的机会。

sentences.english: The surgeon general says there is no safe level of secondhand smoke.
sentences.chinese: 外科医生主任说，二手烟是种不安全因素。

sentences.english: Over the long term, secondhand smoke also raises the risk of disease in nonsmokers.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，二手烟也增加了非烟民的患病几率。

sentences.english: High concentrations of many of these chemicals are found in secondhand smoke.
sentences.chinese: 研究发现二手烟中含有高浓度的上述有害物质。

sentences.english: Secondhand smoke also causes chronic coughing, phlegm and wheezing, as well as eye and nose irritation.
sentences.chinese: 二手烟同时还会造成慢性咳嗽，痰多和哮喘，以及。

sentences.english: Studies of secondhand smoke have indeed moved outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 二手烟的研究确实已经移至户外。
